item.title: Zeme Heraka
item.description: A group of nAga-s inspired, by rAni Gaidinliu, has remained heathen, and has successfully resisted Christianization in Nagaland. Syncretism with Hinduism From Longkumer’s thesis (pdf link): The ideology of the RSS and VHP has already seeped into Heraka rhetoric and their talk is often peppered with these nation-building bumper stickers. Phrases such as ‘all religions have truth, compassion, and love and are like streams that go into the one ocean’ or ‘invasion of foreign religion and foreign culture will bring total destruction of Naga society.
